package.description: Some utilities for Prolog: * Interface to the Weka and Mallet machine learning libraries, whose algorithms can be applied to instances in KnowRob (in classifiers.pl) * jython-interface for Prolog (in jython.pl, deprecated for internal use) * Several small utility scripts (in util.pl) * Methods for computing different semantic similarity values (comp_similarity.pl)
package.author: Bernhard Kirchlechner, Moritz Tenorth, Jakob Engel
